title: Remote computational server management tool
description:
Project: the tool enables students to make computations on the university supercomputer without Linux command line skills. It provides a web-client in order to upload project files, build projects and run them.

This project includes a wide range of tasks: The web-client written in Python (with Flask framework) on the back-end and AngularJS on the front-end;

Python scripts that handle project tasks (building, running, working with file system etc.);

Computational server security configuration: AppArmor for program capabilities, quotatool for hard disk usage limitations, users’ permissions configuration.
